resources.string: You just have to take a deep breath, relax and let the game come to you.
Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
It is nice finding that place where you can just go and relax.
I do not really think about the degree of difficulty or the possibility of making a mistake
I just try to relax and let my preparation and training take over
The time to relax is when you do not have time for it.
It is good to reflect on life and take a step back and sit and relax and do something else.
Art raises its head where creeds relax.
For me, it is important to relax and concentrate on what I want to do.
I like to have quiet evenings and relax.
Sunday is the core of our civilisation, dedicated to thought and reverence.
Act the way that you want to feel
There is more to life than increasing its speed
Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
Our anxiety does not come from thinking about the future, but from wanting to control it
Itâ€™s not stress that kills us, it is our reaction to it
